summary: A vibrator is a sex toy that uses electric vibrations to create pleasurable feelings on the body. It can be used by one person or during partnered activities to stimulate sensitive areas like the genitals, anus, or rectum. Vibrators come in various shapes and sizes and can help people, especially women, achieve orgasms when they might struggle to do so otherwise. They are often recommended by sex therapists.
title: Vibrator (sex toy)
